remarks: If ` A ` satisfies the properties of the coefficient function, it must be equal to the coefficient function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
coeeq.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
coeeq.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
coeeq.3 $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) $.
coeeq.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A " ( ZZ>= ` ( N + 1 ) ) ) = { 0 } ) $.
coeeq.5 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
coeeq $p |- ( ph -> ( coeff ` F ) = A ) $.
$d A k z $.
$d N k z $.
